contentrichtext.text: '''Open Your Eyes''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Music== ===Albums=== * [[Open Your Eyes (Goldfinger album)|''Open Your Eyes'' (Goldfinger album)]], or the title song, 2002 * [[Open Your Eyes (Warzone album)|''Open Your Eyes'' (Warzone album)]], or the title song, 1989 * [[Open Your Eyes (Yes album)|''Open Your Eyes'' (Yes album)]], or the title song (see below), 1997 * ''Open Your Eyes'', a 1979 album by [[The Faragher Brothers]] * ''Open Your Eyes'', a 2003 album by [[Kim Kyung Ho#Studio Albums|Kim Kyung Ho]] * ''Open Your Eyes'', a 1979 album by [[Maria Muldaur#Solo|Maria Muldaur]] * ''Open Your Eyes'', a 2011 album by [[Rapture Ruckus]] * ''Open Your Eyes'', a 2003 unreleased album by [[Victoria Beckham#Solo music artist|Victoria Beckham]] ===Songs=== * [[Open Your Eyes (Alter Bridge song)|"Open Your Eyes" (Alter Bridge song)]], 2004 * [[Open Your Eyes (Guano Apes song)|"Open Your Eyes" (Guano Apes song)]], 1997 * [[Open Your Eyes (Snow Patrol song)|"Open Your Eyes" (Snow Patrol song)]], 2007 * [[Open Your Eyes (Yes song)|"Open Your Eyes" (Yes song)]], 1997 * "Open Your Eyes", by 12 Stones from ''[[12 Stones (album)|12 Stones]]'' * "Open Your Eyes", by Asia from ''[[Alpha (Asia album)|Alpha]]'' * "Open Your Eyes", by [[Bobby Caldwell]] * "Open Your Eyes", by Immortal Technique from ''[[The 3rd World]]'' * "Open Your Eyes", by [[Nalin & Kane]] * "Open Your Eyes", by Staind from ''[[Break the Cycle]]'' * "Open Your Eyes", by Steve Angello and Alex Metric from the soundtrack of the video game ''[[FIFA 12]]'' * "Open Your Eyes", by Stream of Passion from ''[[Embrace the Storm]]'' * "Open Your Eyes", by Sum 41 from ''[[Chuck (album)|Chuck]]'' * "Open Your Eyes", by United State of Electronica from ''[[U.S.E. (album)|U.S.E.]]'' ==Other media== * [[Open Your Eyes (1997 film)|''Open Your Eyes'' (1997 film)]] (''Abre los ojos''), a film by Alejandro AmenÃ¡bar * [[Open Your Eyes (2008 film)|''Open Your Eyes'' (2008 film)]], a short film by Susan Cohen * ''Open Your Eyes'', a 2012 short film starring [[Lia Marie Johnson]] * [[Open Your Eyes (magazine)|''Open Your Eyes'' (magazine)]], an American magazine for Latinos * ''Open Your Eyes'', a morning program on [[Great Belize Television]] ==See also== * [[Eyelid]] * [[Close Your Eyes (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
